trans-unit.source: Implements an <xref href="System.IO.Log.IRecordSequence"></xref> on top of a file.
trans-unit.target: 實作<xref href="System.IO.Log.IRecordSequence"></xref>檔案頂端。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The FileRecordSequence is a record sequence based on a single log file in the file system.
trans-unit.target: FileRecordSequence 是根據檔案系統中的單一記錄檔記錄順序。

trans-unit.source: It is a simple implementation of the <xref:System.IO.Log.IRecordSequence> interface, on top of a simple file-based log.
trans-unit.target: 它是簡單的實作的<xref:System.IO.Log.IRecordSequence>介面，在簡單的檔案式記錄檔。</xref:System.IO.Log.IRecordSequence>

trans-unit.source: To manipulate a file-based log, the account that your application is running in must have sufficient privileges, as dictated by the file system security at the time the FileRecordSequence is constructed.
trans-unit.target: 若要管理以檔案為基礎的記錄檔，應用程式正在執行中的帳戶必須有足夠的權限，由檔案系統安全性規定 FileRecordSequence 建構時。

trans-unit.source: In addition, a demand for FullTrust is made at construction time.
trans-unit.target: 此外，在建構階段進行要求 fulltrust 權限。

trans-unit.source: The permission verification results are cached thereafter in keeping with the Windows security model.
trans-unit.target: 為了保持 Windows 安全性模型權限驗證結果會快取。

trans-unit.source: You should ensure that you do not accidentally expose the contents of the record sequence to an unauthorized user.
trans-unit.target: 您應該確定，您不小心公開未授權的使用者記錄順序的內容。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence"></xref> class with a specified file.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence"></xref>類別使用指定的檔案。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates read/write access to the file, and opens the file with share Read access.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立檔案的讀取/寫入存取，並共用讀取權限來開啟檔案。

trans-unit.source: This means that requests to open the file for writing by this or another process fails until this <xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence> instance has been disposed of, but read attempts will succeed.
trans-unit.target: 這表示這個或另一個處理序所開啟檔案進行寫入的要求會失敗，直到這<xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence>執行個體已經過處置，但嘗試讀取則會成功。</xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence>

trans-unit.source: If `path` is not found, a new file is created with a size of 0 bytes.
trans-unit.target: 如果`path`找不到，建立新的檔案大小為 0 個位元組。

trans-unit.source: A relative or absolute path for the file that this <xref href="System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence"></xref> instance will encapsulate.
trans-unit.target: 檔案的相對或絕對路徑這個<xref href="System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence"></xref>將會在封裝執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The file specified by path is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的檔案 path 不正確。

trans-unit.source: The file specified by path cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的檔案 path 找不到。

trans-unit.source: The request cannot be performed because of an unexpected I/O exception.
trans-unit.target: 無法執行要求，因為發生意外的 I/O 例外狀況。

trans-unit.target: 沒有足夠的記憶體可以繼續執行程式。

trans-unit.source: Access for the specified log store is denied by the operating system.

trans-unit.target: 向前移的記錄檔的基底序號。

trans-unit.target: 這個方法無法被繼承。

trans-unit.target: newBaseSequenceNumber不正確。

trans-unit.source: Writes a log record to the <xref href="System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將記錄檔記錄寫入<xref href="System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Data contained in the `data` parameter will be concatenated into a single byte array for appending as the record.
trans-unit.target: 中所含資料`data`參數將串連至單一位元組陣列，以便附加成記錄。

trans-unit.source: However, no provision is made for splitting data back into array segments when the record is read.
trans-unit.target: 不過，不會讀取記錄時，將資料分割回陣列區段。

trans-unit.source: Normally, this method completes before the record has been written.
trans-unit.target: 通常，這個方法已寫入記錄前完成。

trans-unit.source: To ensure that a record has been written, either specify the <xref:System.IO.Log.RecordAppendOptions> flag using the `recordAppendOptions` parameter, or call the <xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.Flush%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要確定已寫入某筆記錄，也可以指定<xref:System.IO.Log.RecordAppendOptions>旗標使用`recordAppendOptions`參數或呼叫<xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.Flush%2A>方法。</xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.Flush%2A> </xref:System.IO.Log.RecordAppendOptions>

trans-unit.source: The appended record will consume space that has been previously reserved, using a reservation specified by the `reservations` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 附加的記錄將會取用先前所保留，使用所指定的保留區的空間`reservations`參數。

trans-unit.source: If the append succeeds, it will consume the smallest reservation area that can hold the data, and that reservation area will be removed from the collection.

trans-unit.source: The operation cannot be performed because the record sequence was opened with read-only access.
trans-unit.target: 記錄順序是以唯讀存取開啟，無法執行操作。

trans-unit.source: The request could not be performed because of an unexpected I/O exception.
trans-unit.target: 無法執行要求，因為發生意外的 I/O 例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The method was called after the sequence has been disposed of.
trans-unit.target: 已在處置序列之後呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: There is not enough memory to continue the execution of the program.
trans-unit.target: 沒有足夠的記憶體可以繼續執行程式。

trans-unit.source: The record sequence is full.
trans-unit.target: 記錄順序已滿。

trans-unit.source: No reservation large enough to fit data can be found in reservations.
trans-unit.target: 沒有夠大，無法容納的保留區 data 位於 reservations 。

trans-unit.source: Gets the sequence number of the first valid record in the current <xref href="System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得在目前的第一個有效記錄的序號<xref href="System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Valid sequence numbers are greater than or equal to BaseSequenceNumber and less than <xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.LastSequenceNumber%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有效的序號會大於或等於 BaseSequenceNumber，且小於<xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.LastSequenceNumber%2A>.</xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.LastSequenceNumber%2A>

trans-unit.source: All other sequence numbers are invalid.
trans-unit.target: 其他所有序號都全都無效。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property can be changed by calling the <xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.WriteRestartArea%2A> or <xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.AdvanceBaseSequenceNumber%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 可以變更這個屬性的值，藉由呼叫<xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.WriteRestartArea%2A>或<xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.AdvanceBaseSequenceNumber%2A>方法。</xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.AdvanceBaseSequenceNumber%2A> </xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.WriteRestartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: The lowest sequence number that corresponds to a valid record in the <xref href="System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 對應中的有效記錄的最小序號<xref href="System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The property was accessed after the sequence has been disposed of.
trans-unit.target: 已在處置序列之後存取此屬性。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous append operation.
trans-unit.target: 開始執行非同步的附加作業。

trans-unit.source: This method cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: You should pass the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> returned by this method to the <xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.EndAppend%2A> method, to ensure that the append operation has completed and resources can be freed appropriately.
trans-unit.target: 您應該傳遞<xref:System.IAsyncResult>由這個方法以傳回<xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.EndAppend%2A>方法，以確定附加作業已完成，而且可以適當地釋放資源。</xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.EndAppend%2A> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: If an error has occurred during an asynchronous append, an exception is not thrown until the <xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.EndAppend%2A> method is called with the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> returned by this method.
trans-unit.target: 如果在非同步附加期間發生錯誤，例外狀況才會擲回直到<xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.EndAppend%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.IAsyncResult>這個方法所傳回。</xref:System.IAsyncResult> </xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.EndAppend%2A>

trans-unit.source: Data contained in the `data` parameter will be concatenated into a single byte array for appending as the record.
trans-unit.target: 中所含資料`data`參數將串連至單一位元組陣列，以便附加成記錄。

trans-unit.source: However, no provision is made for splitting data back into array segments when the record is read.
trans-unit.target: 不過，不會讀取記錄時，將資料分割回陣列區段。

trans-unit.source: Normally, this method completes before the record has been written.
trans-unit.target: 通常，這個方法已寫入記錄前完成。

trans-unit.source: To ensure that a record has been written, either specify the <xref:System.IO.Log.RecordAppendOptions> flag using the `recordAppendOptions` parameter, or call the <xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.Flush%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要確定已寫入某筆記錄，也可以指定<xref:System.IO.Log.RecordAppendOptions>旗標使用`recordAppendOptions`參數或呼叫<xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.Flush%2A>方法。</xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.Flush%2A> </xref:System.IO.Log.RecordAppendOptions>

trans-unit.source: A list of byte array segments that will be concatenated and appended as the record.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列區段的即將串連並附加成記錄清單。

trans-unit.source: The sequence number of the next record in the user-specified order.
trans-unit.target: 使用者指定的順序的下一個記錄序號。

trans-unit.source: The sequence number of the next record in Previous order.
trans-unit.target: 之前的順序的下一個記錄序號。

trans-unit.source: A valid value of <xref href="System.IO.Log.RecordAppendOptions"></xref> that specifies how the data should be written.
trans-unit.target: 有效值<xref href="System.IO.Log.RecordAppendOptions"></xref>指定寫入資料的方式。

trans-unit.source: An optional asynchronous callback, to be called when the append is complete.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性的非同步回呼，在附加完成時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous append request from other requests.
trans-unit.target: 使用者提供的物件，可區別這個特定非同步附加要求與其他要求。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that represents the asynchronous append, which could still be pending.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>，表示非同步的附加，可能還在暫止。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: The request cannot be performed because of an unexpected I/O exception.
trans-unit.target: 無法執行要求，因為發生意外的 I/O 例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The method was called after the sequence has been disposed of.
trans-unit.target: 已在處置序列之後呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: There is not enough memory to continue the execution of the program.
trans-unit.target: 沒有足夠的記憶體可以繼續執行程式。

trans-unit.source: The record sequence is full.
trans-unit.target: 記錄順序已滿。

trans-unit.source: No reservation large enough to fit data can be found in reservations.
trans-unit.target: 沒有夠大，無法容納的保留區 data 位於 reservations 。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous flush operation, using space previously reserved in the sequence.
trans-unit.target: 開始非同步的清除作業，使用先前在順序中保留的空間。

trans-unit.source: This method cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: You should pass the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> returned by the current method to the <xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.EndFlush%2A> method to ensure that the flush completes and resources are freed appropriately.
trans-unit.target: 您應該傳遞<xref:System.IAsyncResult>目前的方法來傳回<xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.EndFlush%2A>方法，以確保清除完成，並適當地釋放資源。</xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.EndFlush%2A> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs during an asynchronous flush, an exception is not thrown until the <xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.EndFlush%2A> method is called with the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> returned by this method.
trans-unit.target: 如果在非同步清除期間發生錯誤，例外狀況才會擲回直到<xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.EndFlush%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.IAsyncResult>這個方法所傳回。</xref:System.IAsyncResult> </xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.EndFlush%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method ensures that all records that have been appended to the <xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence> are durably written.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法可確保所有記錄已附加至<xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence>永久寫入。</xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence>

trans-unit.source: If a record sequence has been disposed of, or if you pass an invalid argument, exceptions are thrown immediately within this operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果已經處置了記錄順序，或是您傳遞了無效的引數，會擲回例外狀況立即在此作業。

trans-unit.source: Errors that occurred during an asynchronous flush request, for example, a disk failure during the I/O request, will result in exceptions being thrown when the <xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.EndFlush%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 非同步清除要求，例如，磁碟失敗期間，在 I/O 要求期間發生的錯誤會導致擲回例外狀況時<xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.EndFlush%2A>方法呼叫。</xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.EndFlush%2A>

trans-unit.source: The sequence number of the latest record that must be written.
trans-unit.target: 必須寫入之最新記錄的序號。

trans-unit.source: If <xref href="System.IO.Log.SequenceNumber"></xref> is invalid, then all records must be written.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref href="System.IO.Log.SequenceNumber"></xref>無效，則必須寫入所有的記錄。

trans-unit.source: An optional asynchronous callback, to be called when the flush is complete.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性的非同步回呼，排清完成時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous flush request from other requests.
trans-unit.target: 使用者提供的物件，可從其他要求中辨別這個特定非同步清除要求。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that represents the asynchronous flush operation, which could still be pending.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>，表示非同步排清作業可能還在擱置中。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: One or more of the arguments is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 一或多個引數無效。

trans-unit.source: sequenceNumber is not valid for this sequence.
trans-unit.target: sequenceNumber無效，無法對此順序。

trans-unit.source: sequenceNumber is not between the base and last sequence numbers of this sequence.
trans-unit.target: sequenceNumber不是介於這個順序的基底序號和最後一個序號之間。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurred while flushing the data.
trans-unit.target: 清除資料時發生 I/O 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The method was called after the sequence has been disposed of.
trans-unit.target: 已在處置序列之後呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.target: 您應該傳遞<xref:System.IAsyncResult>由這個方法以傳回<xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.EndReserveAndAppend%2A>方法，以確定附加作業已完成，而且可以適當地釋放資源。</xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.EndReserveAndAppend%2A> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: If an error has occurred during an asynchronous append, an exception is not thrown until the <xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.EndReserveAndAppend%2A> method is called with the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> returned by this method.
trans-unit.target: 如果在非同步附加期間發生錯誤，例外狀況才會擲回直到<xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.EndReserveAndAppend%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.IAsyncResult>這個方法所傳回。</xref:System.IAsyncResult> </xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.EndReserveAndAppend%2A>

trans-unit.source: Data contained in the `data` parameter will be concatenated into a single byte array for appending as the record.
trans-unit.target: 中所含資料`data`參數將串連至單一位元組陣列，以便附加成記錄。

trans-unit.source: However, no provision is made for splitting data back into array segments when the record is read.
trans-unit.target: 不過，不會讀取記錄時，將資料分割回陣列區段。

trans-unit.source: If the append fails, no space is reserved.

trans-unit.source: Normally, this method may complete before the record has been written.

trans-unit.source: To ensure that a record has been written, either specify the <xref:System.IO.Log.RecordAppendOptions> flag using the `recordAppendOptions` parameter, or call the <xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.Flush%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要確定已寫入某筆記錄，也可以指定<xref:System.IO.Log.RecordAppendOptions>旗標使用`recordAppendOptions`參數或呼叫<xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.Flush%2A>方法。</xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.Flush%2A> </xref:System.IO.Log.RecordAppendOptions>

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous restart area write operation, using space previously reserved in the sequence.
trans-unit.target: 開始執行非同步的重新啟動區域寫入作業，使用先前在順序中保留的空間。

trans-unit.source: This method cannot be inherited.

trans-unit.source: You should pass the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> returned by this method to the <xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.EndWriteRestartArea%2A> method, to assure that the restart area write operation has completed and resources can be freed appropriately.
trans-unit.target: 您應該傳遞<xref:System.IAsyncResult>由這個方法以傳回<xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.EndWriteRestartArea%2A>方法，以確定重新啟動區域寫入作業已完成，而且可以適當地釋放資源。</xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.EndWriteRestartArea%2A> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: If an error has occurred during an asynchronous restart area write operation, an exception is not thrown until the <xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.EndWriteRestartArea%2A> method is called with the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> returned by this method.

trans-unit.source: Data contained in the `data` parameter will be concatenated into a single byte array for appending as the record.
trans-unit.target: 中所含資料`data`參數將串連至單一位元組陣列，以便附加成記錄。

trans-unit.source: However, no provision is made for splitting data back into array segments when the record is read.
trans-unit.target: 不過，不會讀取記錄時，將資料分割回陣列區段。

trans-unit.source: When the operation successfully completes, the base sequence number has been updated.
trans-unit.target: 當作業成功完成時，基底序號已經更新。

trans-unit.source: All log records with sequence numbers less than the new base sequence number are inaccessible.
trans-unit.target: 所有記錄的序號小於新基底序號都無法存取。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.IO.Log.ReservationCollection> is specified, the written restart area will consume space that has been previously reserved, using a reservation contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.IO.Log.ReservationCollection>指定，則寫入重新啟動區域將會取用先前所保留，使用包含在集合中的保留區的空間。</xref:System.IO.Log.ReservationCollection>

trans-unit.source: If the method succeeds, it will consume the smallest reservation that can hold the data, and that reservation will be removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法成功，便會取用的最小保留區，其可保留資料，而且該保留區將會從集合移除。

trans-unit.source: If a record sequence has been disposed of, or if you pass an invalid argument, exceptions are thrown immediately within this operation.

trans-unit.source: The new base sequence number.
trans-unit.target: 新基底序號。

trans-unit.source: The specified sequence number must be greater than or equal to the current base sequence number.
trans-unit.target: 指定的序號必須大於或等於目前基底序號。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IO.Log.ReservationCollection"></xref> that contains the reservation that should be used for this restart area.

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous restart area write operation, using space previously reserved in the sequence.
trans-unit.target: 開始執行非同步的重新啟動區域寫入作業，使用先前在順序中保留的空間。

trans-unit.source: This method cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: You should pass the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> returned by this method to the <xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.EndWriteRestartArea%2A> method, to assure that the restart area write operation has completed and resources can be freed appropriately.
trans-unit.target: 您應該傳遞<xref:System.IAsyncResult>由這個方法以傳回<xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.EndWriteRestartArea%2A>方法，以確定重新啟動區域寫入作業已完成，而且可以適當地釋放資源。</xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.EndWriteRestartArea%2A> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: If an error has occurred during an asynchronous restart area write operation, an exception is not thrown until the <xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.EndWriteRestartArea%2A> method is called with the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> returned by this method.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行非同步的重新啟動區域寫入作業期間發生錯誤，例外狀況才會擲回直到<xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.EndWriteRestartArea%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.IAsyncResult>這個方法所傳回。</xref:System.IAsyncResult> </xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.EndWriteRestartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: Data contained in the `data` parameter will be concatenated into a single byte array for appending as the record.
trans-unit.target: 中所含資料`data`參數將串連至單一位元組陣列，以便附加成記錄。

trans-unit.source: However, no provision is made for splitting data back into array segments when the record is read.
trans-unit.target: 不過，不會讀取記錄時，將資料分割回陣列區段。

trans-unit.source: When the operation successfully completes, the base sequence number has been updated.
trans-unit.target: 當作業成功完成時，基底序號已經更新。

trans-unit.source: All log records with sequence numbers less than the new base sequence number are inaccessible.
trans-unit.target: 所有記錄的序號小於新基底序號都無法存取。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.IO.Log.ReservationCollection> is specified, the written restart area will consume space that has been previously reserved, using a reservation contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.IO.Log.ReservationCollection>指定，則寫入重新啟動區域將會取用先前所保留，使用包含在集合中的保留區的空間。</xref:System.IO.Log.ReservationCollection>

trans-unit.source: If the method succeeds, it will consume the smallest reservation that can hold the data, and that reservation will be removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法成功，便會取用的最小保留區，其可保留資料，而且該保留區將會從集合移除。

trans-unit.source: If a record sequence has been disposed of, or if you pass an invalid argument, exceptions are thrown immediately within this operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果已經處置了記錄順序，或是您傳遞了無效的引數，會擲回例外狀況立即在此作業。

trans-unit.source: Errors that occurred during an asynchronous append request, for example, a disk failure during the I/O request, will result in exceptions being thrown when the <xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.EndWriteRestartArea%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 在非同步附加要求，例如，磁碟失敗期間，在 I/O 要求期間發生的錯誤會導致在時擲回的例外狀況<xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.EndWriteRestartArea%2A>方法呼叫。</xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.EndWriteRestartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerable collection of records in the sequence.
trans-unit.target: 序列中傳回之記錄的可列舉集合。

trans-unit.source: This method cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: This method returns an enumerable collection of records in the sequence.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回序列中之記錄的可列舉集合。

trans-unit.source: The order of the enumerated records depends on the value of the `logRecordEnum` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 列舉的記錄順序取決於值`logRecordEnum`參數。

trans-unit.source: The sequence number of the first record where the reading starts.
trans-unit.target: 開始讀取的第一個記錄序號。

trans-unit.source: A valid <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogRecordEnumeratorType"></xref> value that specifies the manner (that is, forward or backward) in which records should be read from a <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogRecordSequence"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 有效<xref href="System.IO.Log.LogRecordEnumeratorType"></xref>值，指定應該讀取哪一筆記錄中的方式 （也就是，向前或向後） <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogRecordSequence"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An enumerable collection of records in the sequence.
trans-unit.target: 記錄順序中的可列舉集合。

trans-unit.source: One or more of the arguments are out of range.
trans-unit.target: 有一或多個引數超出範圍。

trans-unit.source: The operation cannot be performed because the record sequence was opened with write-only access.
trans-unit.target: 記錄順序是以唯寫存取開啟，無法執行操作。

trans-unit.source: The record sequence is corrupted.
trans-unit.target: 記錄順序已損毀。

trans-unit.source: -or- The record was written with an incompatible version of the record sequence.
trans-unit.target: -或者-記錄已寫入的記錄順序版本不相容。

trans-unit.source: The enumeration has ended.
trans-unit.target: 列舉已經結束。

trans-unit.source: -or- The enumeration has not been started.
trans-unit.target: -或者-列舉尚未啟動。

trans-unit.source: A call to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext*> must be made.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext*>必須設法。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext*>

trans-unit.source: The method was called after the sequence has been disposed of.
trans-unit.target: 已在處置序列之後呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: There is not enough memory to continue the execution of the program.
trans-unit.target: 沒有足夠的記憶體可以繼續執行程式。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerable collection of the restart areas in the sequence.
trans-unit.target: 傳回序列中的重新啟動區域的可列舉集合。

trans-unit.source: This method cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The restart areas are enumerated in reverse sequence number order, that is, from the highest sequence number to the lowest sequence number.
trans-unit.target: 重新啟動區域會列舉在反向序列數字的順序，也就是從最低序號最高的序號。

trans-unit.source: Only restart areas with sequence numbers between the last sequence number and the base sequence number are enumerated.
trans-unit.target: 只重新啟動區域的最後一個序號之間序號和要列舉的基底序號。

trans-unit.source: An enumerable collection of the restart areas in the sequence.
trans-unit.target: 序列中的重新啟動區域的可列舉集合。

trans-unit.source: The operation cannot be performed because the record sequence was opened with write-only access.
trans-unit.target: 記錄順序是以唯寫存取開啟，無法執行操作。

trans-unit.source: The record sequence is corrupted.
trans-unit.target: 記錄順序已損毀。

trans-unit.source: -or- The record was written with an incompatible version of the record sequence.
trans-unit.target: -或者-記錄已寫入的記錄順序版本不相容。

trans-unit.source: The enumeration has ended.
trans-unit.target: 列舉已經結束。

trans-unit.source: -or- The enumeration has not been started.

trans-unit.source: The method was called after the sequence has been disposed of.
trans-unit.target: 已在處置序列之後呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: There is not enough memory to continue the execution of the program.
trans-unit.target: 沒有足夠的記憶體可以繼續執行程式。

trans-unit.source: Automatically makes a single reservation and appends a record to the sequence.
trans-unit.target: 自動建立單一保留區，並將記錄附加至順序。

trans-unit.source: This method cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Data contained in the `data` parameter will be concatenated into a single byte array for appending as the record.
trans-unit.target: 中所含資料`data`參數將串連至單一位元組陣列，以便附加成記錄。

trans-unit.source: However, no provision is made for splitting data back into array segments when the record is read.
trans-unit.target: 不過，不會讀取記錄時，將資料分割回陣列區段。

trans-unit.source: The specified reservations are added to the provided reservation collection in an atomic operation with a record append operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定的保留區會加入至提供的保留區集合中的不可部分完成的作業與記錄附加作業。

trans-unit.source: If the append fails, no space is reserved.
trans-unit.target: 如果附加失敗，則會不保留任何空間。

trans-unit.source: Normally, this method may complete before the record has been written.
trans-unit.target: 一般來說，這個方法可能會完成之前已寫入記錄。

trans-unit.source: To ensure that a record has been written, either specify the <xref:System.IO.Log.RecordAppendOptions> flag using the `recordAppendOptions` parameter, or call the <xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.Flush%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要確定已寫入某筆記錄，也可以指定<xref:System.IO.Log.RecordAppendOptions>旗標使用`recordAppendOptions`參數或呼叫<xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.Flush%2A>方法。</xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.Flush%2A> </xref:System.IO.Log.RecordAppendOptions>

trans-unit.source: A list of byte array segments that will be concatenated and appended as the record.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列區段的即將串連並附加成記錄清單。

trans-unit.source: The sequence number of the next record in the user-specified order.
trans-unit.target: 使用者指定的順序的下一個記錄序號。

trans-unit.source: The sequence number of the next record in Previous order.
trans-unit.target: 之前的順序的下一個記錄序號。

trans-unit.source: A valid value of <xref href="System.IO.Log.RecordAppendOptions"></xref> that specifies how the data should be written.
trans-unit.target: 有效值<xref href="System.IO.Log.RecordAppendOptions"></xref>指定寫入資料的方式。

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IO.Log.ReservationCollection"> </xref> ，其中包含要建立保留項目中的集合。

trans-unit.target: 附加之記錄序號。

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of bytes that have been reserved.
trans-unit.target: 取得已保留的位元組總數。

trans-unit.source: The total size of all reservations made in this record sequence.
trans-unit.target: 在這個記錄順序中所做的所有保留區的大小總計。

trans-unit.source: The property was accessed after the sequence has been disposed of.
trans-unit.target: 已在處置序列之後存取此屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the sequence number of the most recently written restart area.
trans-unit.target: 取得最近寫入的重新啟動區域的序號。

trans-unit.source: A restart area is used to temporarily store information containing a client's last checkpoint operation.
trans-unit.target: 重新啟動區域可用來暫時儲存包含用戶端的最後一個檢查點作業的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The Common Log File System (CLFS) maintains two restart areas to guarantee that at least one valid area is always available.
trans-unit.target: 常見的記錄檔系統 (CLFS) 會維護兩個重新啟動區域，以保證確定至少一個有效區域永遠可供使用。

trans-unit.source: When a recovery is necessary, the CLFS reads its restart area and all the data from the last checkpoint operation.
trans-unit.target: 當需要復原時，CLFS 會讀取其重新啟動區域和所有資料從最後一個檢查點作業。

trans-unit.source: This data initializes the transaction table, dirty pages table, and open file table so they can be used in the recovery process.
trans-unit.target: 此資料會初始化異動資料表、 中途分頁資料表和開啟檔案資料表，好讓它們可用於復原程序。

trans-unit.source: The sequence number of the most recently written restart area.
trans-unit.target: 重新啟動區域的最近寫入的序號。

trans-unit.source: The property was accessed after the sequence has been disposed of.
trans-unit.target: 已在處置序列之後存取此屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not appends are automatically retried if the log is full.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否將附加的記錄檔已滿時自動重試。

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is `true`, and an <xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.Append%2A> call fails because there is not enough space in the sequence, the record sequence will try to free space and retry the append.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性的值為`true`，和<xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.Append%2A>呼叫失敗，因為在序列中沒有足夠的空間，記錄順序將會嘗試釋放空間，並重試附加。</xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.Append%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if appends are automatically retried if the log is full; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果附加的記錄檔已滿; 自動重試否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The property was accessed after the sequence has been disposed of.
trans-unit.target: 已在處置序列之後存取此屬性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the record sequence determines that the tail must be moved forward.
trans-unit.target: 發生於在記錄順序判斷必須向前移動結尾。

trans-unit.source: This method cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: You can fire this event when the record sequence has run out of space.
trans-unit.target: 您可以引發事件時，記錄順序已用盡空間。

trans-unit.source: When this event is fired, the tail of the sequence (that is, the base sequence number) is moved forward to free up space.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件一經引發，結尾順序 （也就是基底序號） 往前移動以釋放空間。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Writes a restart area to the <xref href="System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將重新啟動區域寫入<xref href="System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: A restart area can be used to temporarily store information containing a client's last checkpoint operation.
trans-unit.target: 重新啟動區域可用來暫時儲存包含用戶端的最後一個檢查點作業的資訊。

trans-unit.source: When a recovery is necessary, you can read a restart area and retrieve all the data from the last checkpoint operation.
trans-unit.target: 當需要復原時，您可以讀取重新啟動區域，並從最後一個檢查點作業擷取所有資料。

trans-unit.source: This data initializes the transaction table, dirty pages table, and open file table so they can be used in the recovery process.
trans-unit.target: 此資料會初始化異動資料表、 中途分頁資料表和開啟檔案資料表，好讓它們可用於復原程序。

trans-unit.source: A restart area can be read using the <xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.ReadRestartAreas%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用來讀取重新啟動區域<xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.ReadRestartAreas%2A>方法。</xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.ReadRestartAreas%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data in the byte array segments will be concatenated into a single byte array for appending as the record.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列區段中的資料將串連至單一位元組陣列，以便附加成記錄。

trans-unit.source: No provision is made for splitting data back into array segments when the restart area is read.
trans-unit.target: 將資料分割回陣列區段中，在讀取重新啟動區域時，會不進行任何佈建。

trans-unit.source: A list of byte array segments that will be concatenated and appended as the record.

trans-unit.source: The method was called after the sequence has been disposed of.
trans-unit.target: 已在處置序列之後呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: There is not enough memory to continue the execution of the program.
trans-unit.target: 沒有足夠的記憶體可以繼續執行程式。

trans-unit.source: The record sequence is full.
trans-unit.target: 記錄順序已滿。

trans-unit.source: Writes a restart area to the <xref href="System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將重新啟動區域寫入<xref href="System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: A restart area can be used to temporarily store information containing a client's last checkpoint operation.
trans-unit.target: 重新啟動區域可用來暫時儲存包含用戶端的最後一個檢查點作業的資訊。

trans-unit.source: When a recovery is necessary, you can read a restart area and retrieve all the data from the last checkpoint operation.
trans-unit.target: 當需要復原時，您可以讀取重新啟動區域，並從最後一個檢查點作業擷取所有資料。

trans-unit.source: This data initializes the transaction table, dirty pages table, and open file table so they can be used in the recovery process.
trans-unit.target: 此資料會初始化異動資料表、 中途分頁資料表和開啟檔案資料表，好讓它們可用於復原程序。

trans-unit.source: A restart area can be read using the <xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.ReadRestartAreas%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用來讀取重新啟動區域<xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.ReadRestartAreas%2A>方法。</xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.ReadRestartAreas%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a restart area is written, the data in the byte array segments are concatenated into a single byte array for appending as the record.
trans-unit.target: 當寫入重新啟動區域時，位元組陣列區段中的資料會串連成單一位元組陣列，以便附加成記錄。

trans-unit.source: No provision is made for splitting data back into array segments when the restart area is read.
trans-unit.target: 將資料分割回陣列區段中，在讀取重新啟動區域時，會不進行任何佈建。

trans-unit.source: When this method successfully completes, the base sequence number has been updated.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法順利完成時，基底序號已經更新。

trans-unit.source: All log records with sequence numbers less than the new base sequence number are inaccessible.
trans-unit.target: 所有記錄的序號小於新基底序號都無法存取。

trans-unit.source: A list of byte array segments that will be concatenated and appended as the record.
trans-unit.target: 位元組陣列區段的即將串連並附加成記錄清單。

trans-unit.source: The new base sequence number.
trans-unit.target: 新基底序號。

trans-unit.source: The specified sequence number must be greater than or equal to the current base sequence number.
trans-unit.target: 指定的序號必須大於或等於目前基底序號。

trans-unit.source: The sequence number of the written restart area.
trans-unit.target: 序號寫入之重新啟動區域。

trans-unit.source: One or more of the arguments are <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一或多個引數的<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: newBaseSeqNum不是介於這個順序的基底序號和最後一個序號之間。

trans-unit.source: -or- A new or existing archive tail or base of the active log is invalid.

trans-unit.source: If a reservation is specified, the written restart area will consume space that has been previously reserved, using a reservation contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果已指定保留區，寫入的重新啟動區域將會取用先前所保留，使用包含在集合中的保留區的空間。

trans-unit.source: If the method succeeds, it will consume the smallest reservation that can contain the data, and that reservation will be removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法成功，便會取用的最小保留區，可以包含的資料，而且該保留區將會從集合移除。

trans-unit.source: If a record sequence has been disposed of, or if you pass an invalid argument, exceptions are thrown immediately within this operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果已經處置了記錄順序，或是您傳遞了無效的引數，會擲回例外狀況立即在此作業。

trans-unit.source: Errors that occurred during an asynchronous append request, for example, a disk failure during the I/O request, will result in exceptions being thrown when the <xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.EndReserveAndAppend%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 在非同步附加要求，例如，磁碟失敗期間，在 I/O 要求期間發生的錯誤會導致在時擲回的例外狀況<xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.EndReserveAndAppend%2A>方法呼叫。</xref:System.IO.Log.FileRecordSequence.EndReserveAndAppend%2A>
